snippet: Sam Querrey got past Martin Klizan in straight sets 6-3, 6-3 in the first round of the Rogers Cup men's tournament on Monday.
abstract: Sam Querrey beats Martin Klizan in first round of Rogers Cup; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: Sam Querrey got past Martin Klizan in straight sets 6-3, 6-3 in the first round of the Rogers Cup men's tournament on Monday.

headline.main: Sam Querrey Earns 1st-Round Win in Montreal
